devdoc.details: Faucet contract for $TKN & the Chainpoint Network

getLastSubscribedAtBlock().details: Returns the block in which a successful dispersement took place

getTotalSupply().details: Returns remaining totalSupply available for dispersement

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

isSubscribed(address).details: Returns whether or not the ETH Address has already subscribed to the Faucet

params._addr: The address to check subscription status of

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setToken(address).details: Sets the contract address for the $TKN ContractCan only be invoked by contract owner

params._tokenAddr: The contract address of the $TKN Contract

setToken(address).return: Boolean indicating result of method execution

subscribe().details: Invoked by future Chainpoint Node Operators which disperses min. registration amount into Chainpoint NetworkCan only be invoked by contract owner
subscribe().return: Boolean indicating result of method execution

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

devdoc.title: Chainpoint Faucet

methods.constructor: Constructor sets the finite totalSupply of the Faucet which has been minted to the Faucet Contract when the $TKN Contract was deployed

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
